3: The Industrial Carriage is right ahead of us.
This has been going unexpectedly smoothly.
All thanks to Sophia... I'm glad you're alright.
You might be small in stature, but you're immensely capable...
True!
The repair team will enter the carriage with you, then we'll split the group. The core of the manufacturing plant needs to be fixed immediately.
I'll come with you, then.
(Nods)
The Industrial Carriage is filled with all kinds of machines, which means there will be quite a number of Corrupted.
You can take them down.
In that case, Commandant, you'll lead the team to clear the Corrupted.
And the repair team will enter the plant to fix it up.

2: The Gray Ravens will support you.
4: You two are quite in sync...

3: I've optimized my frame's performance.
Liv, protect Commandant. I'll be in the front, trying to provide you with the most optimal operating environment. Bianca, you've got the rear. Don't let any Corrupted go.
Roger!
Understood.
...This feels like when I first joined the Purifying Force.
I've sent you the blueprint of the carriage. The plan can't fully represent the actual environment, so you must be careful.
We will.
You can count on me!
Commandant, this will be a tough fight.
Don't worry, I'll also do my best to protect you.
I'm used to this kind of work, after all.
I believe in you.
